messageBody:
cOre dUmPeR wrote:

> I have to test a series of previously written
> applications. All of them use System.out and
> System.err to output data. These applcations run
> either by themselves or under a JUnit suite i wrote.
>
> When running under JUnit, I would like to redirect the
> output of the applications to a log file, while STILL
> outputting my JUnit textUI.TestRunner results to the
> screen.
>
> any ideas how to do this?

If the application uses the same streams as the test runner, then what
you ask is impossible.

The best you can do is customize the test runner (it's the path of least
resistance) to send its output somewhere different, then redirect all
standard output and standard error to files. You should be able to
extend the textui TestRunner and override the ResultPrinter to print to
a file, for example. Not too much work.
